THE INN
We want you to have less stress while planning your trip to visit the Yellowstone areas. Check our website, or contact us directly for a seamless, worries-less Yellowstone trip!

Find Us

102 S Electric St,  West Yellowstone, MT,59758

The Perfect Stop 

For Your Yellowstone Trip
~ Preview ~
ÔªøCar Rental

Built in 2016, Tao's Inn is located in West Yellowstone, the western entrance of the Yellowstone National Park. We have free parking areas for your bikes, cars, or even trailer. WiFi coverage can be found all over the property. AC and streaming TV available in every room.  With walking distance to downtown and other tourist attractions such as Grizzly & Wolf Discovery Center and Yellowstone Aerial Adventures- Zipline Adventure Park. ,Tao's Inn will be your convenient and affordable stay while visiting the Yellowstone National Park!

We are right next to Yellowstone Avenue, get on the road and head east then you can reach the Yellowstone National Park Western Entrance within a minute.

Downtown and many other businesses such as gift stores, restaurants, and grocery store are in the north of our property, head north of Electric street for two blocks and you will arrive the heart of this lovely little town.

We will provide every guest with a map of the town and the national park so you are not likely to get lost here in the wild, just kidding, road system here is straight forward and super easy compared to big cities, feel free to ask us any questions regardless whether you are staying with us or not, always happy to help.

Enjoy the 2022 Brand new four wheel drive 375 horse power Jeep!

This beautiful Patriotic Red Wrangler Unlimited Sahara hybrid 4xe is comfortable with leather seats and great sound system. It also comes with convertible hard top. 

2.0L turbo PHEV engine, automatic transmission, 4 wheel drive, lots of cool features like push to start button, backup camera, audio connection, Apple CarPlay and Android Audio.

This baby is wild and made for outdoor goer, skiing, camping, off road, or weekend getaway!

Mazda Cx-30 2022 From $ 115 Per Day Come and take advantage of this amazing deal! This is a brand new ALl WHEEL drive 2022 Mazda CX-30! It is by far one of the most fun, and enjoyable crossover (sub-SUV) on the road.

 With its great gas mileage, lists of safety features. This truly is the perfect rental car to explore skiing resort, mountains, and national parks.

This brand new 2021 wrangler sports S automatic two door Jeep is the gem in my neighborhood. I would like every friend to share my joy by taking her for a day trip, a weekend run away, or a simply cruise in our beautiful surroundings mountains and national forest, national parks. She will never let you down.

This is 2022 model. Turo has not yet imported date for 2022 yet so I have to listed as 21 model. Brand new and great gas mileage. Snow tires and all wheel drive makes it a great choice for the mid-west winter fun!

This spacious 7 passenger van is perfect for the ski/snowboarding use! You can fold the 2nd and 3rd row chairs into the floor for a moving space of ALL your gears (4'x8'x5'). All season tires (with Mud/Snow features) and snow chains (optional) provide smooth and worry free experience here in winter and nearby snowy mountains.

Brand new and great gas mileage. It is fully capable of driving to the beautiful ski resort or to the red rock deserts down south. All season tires and all wheel drive makes it a great choice for the winter and summer fun!

Ski racks and cooler available when request. Just let me know.

View On AirbnbMontana Craftman's Pearl

Looking for a bigger and quieter place for your family and friends?
Standard hotel rooms do not fit you the best for your upcoming Yellowstone trip?‚Äã

My friend, you might have just found the best solution!

Proudly present you the Donky Ranch Lodge, the newest addition to our vacation rental inventory.  ‚Äã

The lodge located along the borders of the Yellowstone National Park, State of Idaho and State of Montana. You will sense the true America mid-west vibe here. With only 10 minutes drive to the western entrance of Yellowstone National Park and the town center of West Yellowstone, you will acquire the ease of getting around while staying at an astonishing and quiet living environment.

With three bedrooms and rollaway, this lodge can host up to 10 adults, there are two full bathrooms and outdoor grill as well.

You also have access to a big parking area for all the vehicles you bring, a full kitchen to cook a delicious and warm family meal, and the entire ranch area for all your outdoor gatherings.  We also provide a tent and sleep bags for outdoor enthusiasts who would like to spend some time outside the lodge.

Due to the fact we just refurnished this lodge, we are having a soft opening, for a limited time, you can book this lodge for as low as $599 per night. If you think this is a good fit for your trip planning, please contact us with your trip information and the date you are looking to stay here!
